name: Swinub

evolution.description: Swinub can evolve into Piloswine at level 9 and above. When it evolves, its health increases by double its level, and it gains 9 points to add to its ability scores (max 20).

description: The Pig Pokémon. Swinub roots for food by rubbing its snout against the ground. Its favorite food is a mushroom that grows under the cover of dead grass. This Pokémon occasionally roots out hot springs.

abilities.name: Oblivious
abilities.description: This Pokémon is immune to moves that attempt to charm or taunt it.

abilities.name: Snow Cloak
abilities.description: This Pokémon is immune to Hail damage. It's AC is increased by 2 in arctic conditions, or when it is snowing or hailing.

abilities.name: Thick Fat
abilities.description: This Pokemon takes half the damage it otherwise would from Ice and Fire damage.
